column1: Table 5.7: Details of Muloya Wewa environmental improvement cost in MWS-010

column2:
1. Dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Kumbuk/Mee/Madan /Nelli /Guava/Mango/Aththikka/Wal del/Kekuna randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid intervals for 2000 m2. 
And apply mulching, organic manure, and NPK fertilizer.
2.Planting of Areca nut tree s, Vetiver grass, and riparian plants. Covered area 1000 m2. 
3.Agro forestry fruits and associated shade tree planting. Covered area 2000 m2
4. Construction of 6 numbers or more of 3mx2mx1m Sabo dams using available boulders.
5.Excavate and remove sediment deposits and earth of tank bed. (DAD J05A+J06A) Estimated qty 2400 m3
6.Transport of excavator J10A
7. Capacity building programs on agro forestry, poly tunnels, micro irrigation etc.
